Name: speedflux
Overview: This tool will continuosly run Speedtests at the chosen interval and export the data to InfluxDB. <br>

influxdbaddress.Name: InfluxDB Address
influxdbaddress.Description:
Container Variable: INFLUX_DB_ADDRESS
IP or Hostname of Influx DB

influxdbdatabasename.Name: InfluxDB Database Name
influxdbdatabasename.Description:
Container Variable: INFLUX_DB_DATABASE
If the database doesn't exist, it will be created.

testinterval.Name: Test Interval
testinterval.Description: How often should speed be tested, in minutes. Default is set at 2:30 as I like to see changes over time at different times of day.

influxdbtags.value: isp, external_ip, server_id, server_name, server_location, speedtest_url
influxdbtags.Name: InfluxDB Tags
influxdbtags.Default: isp, external_ip, server_id, server_name, server_location, speedtest_url
influxdbtags.Description: Tags to be added to the datasets. See https://github.com/breadlysm/speedtest-to-influxdb#tag-options. Tags must be comma seperated

pinginterval.Name: Ping Interval
pinginterval.Description: Interval is in seconds. This is how often your latency will be checked.

pingservers.Name: Ping Servers
pingservers.Description: hostnames or domains to use to test ping. On every ping interval, all servers input will be tested. Must be comma seperated.

(optional)serverid.Name: (Optional) Server ID
(optional)serverid.Description: Input a Ookla Speedtest server ID to use for your tests. This will use this server for every test.
